mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as store_name,c.name as workunit_name,d.name as project_name from ems_borrow a inner join ems_store b on a.store_id=b.id inner join ems_workUnit c on a.workUnit_id=c.id inner join ems_project d on a.project_id=d.id where a.id=#{borrow_id}

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,c.unit as prod_unit,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from (select f.*,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.supplier_id,a.style from ems_equipment a inner join ems_borrowlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.borrow_id=#{borrow_id}) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from (select f.id, f.borrow_id,f.ecode,f.isReturn,f.returnDate,f.borrowListType,f.memo ,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.supplier_id,a.style,a.isnew from ems_equipment a inner join ems_borrowlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.borrow_id=#{borrow_id} and a.ecode=#{ecode} ) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id
mapper.update: update ems_borrowlist set isReturn='Y' , returnDate=sysdate where id=#{borrowlist_id}
update ems_borrowlist set borrowListType=#{borrowListType} , returnDate=sysdate,pole_id=#{pole_id} where borrow_id=#{borrow_id} and ecode=#{ecode}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as store_name,c.name as workUnit_name,d.name as project_name,'out' as type from ems_borrow a,ems_store b,ems_workunit c,ems_project d where a.store_id=b.id and a.workunit_id=c.id and a.project_id=d.id and a.status='edit'
